siteProductLine.name: Dirt Master
siteProductLine.overview:
OTR's Dirt Master is an ATV/UTV tire that features an aggressive tread pattern for solid traction and performance on any terrain. A V-shaped tread pattern forces mud out of the tire for consistent traction off-road, and the Dirt Master's 6 ply construction boosts ride comfort by creating a smooth, quiet ride.

Features & Benefits
  • Designed for use on ATVs and UTVs
  • Built with an aggressive, directional tread pattern for solid traction and performance on any terrain
  • V-shaped tread pattern boosts traction and performance on mud and other soft terrains
  • Built with a 6 ply construction that creates a smooth, quiet ride to increase ride comfort

siteProductSpecs.name: Category
siteProductSpecs.description: Mud tires have an aggressive tread pattern, easily providing traction for ATVs and UTVs on muddy terrains while impacting ride quality.

siteProductSpecs.name: Vehicle
siteProductSpecs.description: Built for use on off-road terrains such as dirt, sand, gravel, and mud while also providing some on-road performance. ATV/UTV tires are commonly tough enough to handle any terrain and feature a high flotation design to prevent sinking.

siteProductSpecs.name: Mileage Warranty
siteProductSpecs.description: This product is not covered by a manufacturer’s treadlife warranty.

siteProductSpecs.name: Load Index
siteProductSpecs.description: The maximum carrying capacity for a tire determined by the manufacturer.

siteProductSpecs.name: Load Range
siteProductSpecs.description: The maximum load carrying strength at the specified inflation pressure, also known as ply rating.

siteProductSpecs.name: Sidewall
siteProductSpecs.description: The side of the tire between the tread and rim, with cosmetic branding as well as information about the tire including manufacturer, model, size, etc.

siteProductSpecs.name: Part Number
siteProductSpecs.description: An identifier of a particular tire line and size combination assigned by the tire manufacturer.

siteProductSpecs.name: Section Width
siteProductSpecs.description: The measurement of width from a tires inner sidewall to the outer sidewall.

siteProductSpecs.name: Overall Diameter
siteProductSpecs.description: The diameter of a tire that is inflated without any load applied.

image.altText: ATV Driving Through Mud Equipped with Mud Tires

header.title: Mud tires
header.body:
# Mud tires
Meant for use on [ATVs and UTVs](https://simpletire.com/types/atv-utv-tires), mud tires are commonly used in mud terrains. Mud tires often feature an aggressive tread pattern and reinforced construction for better traction and a longer tread life.

Mud tires are available from many best-in-class tire manufacturers, such as [Carlisle](https://simpletire.com/brands/carlisle-tires/categories/mud), [Cordovan](https://simpletire.com/brands/cordovan-tires/categories/mud), and many more. 

If you're looking for a new set of mud tires online then you've come to the right place as SimpleTire has hundreds of mud tires that meet your driving needs and budget.

[Mud tire reviews](https://simpletire.com/categories/mud-terrain-tires)

articleList.description: Worried about getting stuck in the mud? Here's a guide to buying the best mud tires for your needs.
articleList.title: A Guide To Mud Tires
